title: Caught Offside: EPL Preview Part 2 - Peter Drury, mailbag & predictions
description:
In Part 2 of our EPL preview, we're joined by the new voice of the Premier League for NBC, the one and only Peter Drury (51:12)! Plus, we answer your questions in a special extended mailbag (5:21) and we make our ironclad, must-be-believed predictions for the season (1:15:39).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Peter Drury joins to preview the upcoming Premier League season
